Sentencas: This study intends to illustrate the application of transient kinetics in combinatorial research.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: Thus, it is shown through various case studies how high-throughput transient kinetics may both accelerate the search for new catalytic materials and bring fundamental insights in reaction mechanisms.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: As a first case study, the cracking reactions of the C-6 isomers (n-hexane, 2-methylpentane, 3-methylpentane, 2,3-dimethylbutane, and 2,3-dimethylbutane) over a fluidised catalytic cracking (FCC) catalyst at temperatures between 300 and 650 degreesC have been studied in a temporal-analysis-of-product (TAP) reactor.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: A mathematical model taking into account the extra- and intracrystalline transport phenomena was used to determine the diffusion, sorption, and kinetic parameters for the hydrocarbons studied.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: Sorption and diffusion decrease with increasing branching in agreement with literature data.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: Except product distribution, the activation energies for the overall cracking of the C-6 isomers are similar for all isomers.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: As a second case study, a paralleled TAP reactor with a multisample holder is shown to be an efficient tool for acquiring adsorption/desorption parameters for a series of zeolites, tested to evaluate their potential as catalyst supports in the oxidative dehydrogenation of ethane.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: Finally, the applied combinatorial study was found also suitable for discovering new materials precursors of dense oxygen-conducting membranes.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: From high-throughput transient TAP and TPD experiments, it was possible to derive a strategy directing the rapid combinatorial evolution within the available parameter space.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation

Sentencas: It was shown that high-quality information is accessible from these data, providing all parameters necessary for a well fitting description with a kinetic model.
Titulo: Acceleration in catalyst development by fast transient kinetic investigation
